MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH48 postcode area of West Kirby, affecting properties in Grainger Avenue and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:23PM on Sunday 6th December 2020.
